# Professional Life

Carrie and her business/dance partner, Emmanuel Pierre-Antoine, are the owners and managers of [**EPA Dance Studio NYC**](https://www.epadancestudionyc.com/), the largest and most welcoming ballroom dance studio in the city. Come dance with us!

[![](img/dancing%20in%20green.PNG){width="620"}](https://www.epadancestudionyc.com/)

# Philanthropic Work

Carrie is the former board chair and a big supporter of [**Dancing Classrooms**](https://dancingclassrooms.org/). Through the joyful art and practice of partner dancing, Dancing Classrooms cultivates engaged learners, collaborative leaders, and inclusive spaces.

[![](img/dc1.jpg){width="620"}](https://dancingclassrooms.org/)
:::
